  <script>
    // Ensure categories are loaded before our custom script runs
    // Enhanced for freeze compatibility
    function initializeCategories() {
      if (window['quarto-listing-loaded']) {
        window['quarto-listing-loaded']();
      }
      // Force category initialization after a delay to ensure DOM is ready
      setTimeout(function() {
        if (window.quartoListingCategory) {
          console.log('Category system initialized with freeze compatibility');
        }
      }, 1000);
    }
    
    // Multiple initialization attempts for freeze compatibility
    window.addEventListener('load', initializeCategories);
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initializeCategories);
    
    // Fallback initialization
    setTimeout(initializeCategories, 2000);
  </script>
